name: Mysterious Cities of Gold - The Video Game!
blurb: Help us bring the Mysterious Cities of Gold video game on PC and outside of France with quality translation and cinematic dubbing!

rewards.reward: Pichu Thanks You: You've helped us bring the Cities of Gold game to the whole wild world and for this you have our eternal gratitude.
Child of the iOS: A digital copy of the game for iOS (iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch).
Child of the PC: A digital copy of the game for Windows PC.
Child of the Wii U: A digital copy of the game for Nintendo Wii U.
Child of the 3DS: A digital copy of the game for Nintendo 3DS.
Child of the Sun: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun.
Tao Pack: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only)!

Zia Pack: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold signed to your name by art director (19.6''x31.5'').

Esteban pack: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold (19.6''x31.5'') and Framed artwork print (11.7''x16.5'') signed by director.

Esteban pack [second print]: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold (19.6''x31.5'') and Framed artwork print (11.7''x16.5'') signed by director.

Condor pack: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold (19.6''x31.5'') and Framed artwork print (11.7''x16.5'') signed by director + A very special place in the credit as Associate Producer to the game, limited to only 5 (reward not available in any other pack)

Collector Pack: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold (19.6''x31.5'') and Framed artwork print (11.7''x16.5'') signed by director + Limited edition luxury prints of 4 artworks showcased at the Mysterious Cities of Gold exhibit in April 2013 at "Le Dernier Bar Avant La Fin Du Monde" in Paris.

Thank Gosh I'm a VIP: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Dinner at the famous Parisian "Dernier Bar avant la Fin du Monde" with key members of the team, in a reserved room and with a four-services fine dinner menu themed on the Mysterious Cities of Gold and prepared by the chef especially for this occasion. Date can be set with you (preferably after November if you want to make our lives easier), this does not include transportation to Paris.

Artist For The Day: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Complete day-trip to the studio with the possibility to interact with the team while they work. While on-site, design your own poster with the art director, based on existing assets from the show and the game, we print it out, and the team signs it in front of you. Date can be set with you (preferably after November if you want to make our lives easier), this does not include transportation to Paris.

Descendent of Mu: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Earlybird Access to the game (PC only) + Poster of Mysterious Cities of Gold (19.6''x31.5'') and Framed artwork print (11.7''x16.5'') signed by director + Your likeness appears in the game as a secondary non-playable character.

Designer For The Day: Digital copy of the game + Kickstarter-exclusive Digital Art Book + Your name in the "special thanks" credits as a true child of the sun + Complete day-trip to the studio with the possibility to interact with the team while they work. Collaborate with the game designers to create your very own level, which will be available as DLC, effectively crediting you for level design. Date can be set with you (preferably after November if you want to make our lives easier), this does not include transportation to Paris.

Shut Up And Take My Money: Special combo of everything in the "Thank Gosh, I'm a VIP", "Designer For A Day" and "Artist For A Day" tiers + transportation to Paris (Economy class plane ticket, roundtrip) + 1 night in a 5-star Parisian hotel. Date can be set with you (preferably after November if you want to make our lives easier).
